attributes.action: immediately withdraw all British troops from afghanistan and put them on our streets and borders and make our country a safer place to be.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea that being in Afghanistan makes Britain safer does not hold up, as we seem to let all types of people into Britain so we will always be in constant danger.  Our forces on our streets and our borders would be better for us and for them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
